Technology.Name: Slipstream Projection
Technology.LongDescription: By focusing subspace manipulations at an area in front of a nearby ship, a subspace projector can effectively "plow" subspace, if only for a moment, to increase a local ship's FTL speed.

UnlockedBonus.Name: Slipstreams
UnlockedBonus.Description: Ships traveling within your own empire's borders gain 20% bonus to their FTL speeds.
